text: sa utta#raH paqkShO#&Bavaqth sOdI#cIq digyAmuqpari#ShTA-duqpAda#dhAqt tat pRuqShThama#Bavaqth sOd^^rdhvA digiqyaM ~MvA aqgniH pa~jcE$ShTakaq-stasmAqd-yadaqsyAM Kana#ntyaqBIShTa#kAM tRuqndantyaqBi Sarka#rAq(gm)q sarvAq vA iqyaM ~MvayO$ByOq nakta#M dRuqSE dI$pyatEq tasmA#diqmAM ~MvayA(gm)#siq naktaqM nAddhyA#satEq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAnaqgniM ci#nuqtE pratyEqva - [  ] 18
